name: The_FBI_Story
text:
The FBI Story
The FBI Story was a film starring Jimmy Stewart.
In 1967, thirteen-year-old Dale Cooper owned a poster from the film, which he stated to be his "most important personal item" and forbid anyone else to touch it.
Behind the scenes
The FBI Story is a 1959 film starring James Stewart and directed by Mervyn LeRoy. It is based on the book The FBI Story: A Report to the People by journalist Don Whitehead.
